languages.text: {n}Джай начинает накручивать прядь смоляных волос на палец.{/n} "Язык на Ифрите, моем родном мире, весьма отличается от того, к которому привыкли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. В каждое наше слово вмещается больше одного значения — так наши мудрецы полнее изъясняют свои ученые мысли, а мы, ничтожные обыватели — свои страсти и желания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай начинает накручивать прядь смоляных волос на палец.{/n} "Язык на Ифрите, моем родном мире, весьма отличается от того, к которому привыкли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. В каждое наше слово вмещается больше одного значения — так наши мудрецы полнее изъясняют свои ученые мысли, а мы, ничтожные обыватели — свои страсти и желания".

languages.text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай начинает накручивать прядь смоляных волос на палец.{/n} "Язык на Ифрите, моем родном мире, весьма отличается от того, к которому привыкли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. В каждое наше слово вмещается больше одного значения — так наши мудрецы полнее изъясняют свои ученые мысли, а мы, ничтожные обыватели — свои страсти и желания".

We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly commoners, our base passions and desires."

We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly commoners, our base passions and desires."

We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly commoners, our base passions and desires."

{n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly commoners, our base passions and desires."

languages.text: {n}婕伊用手指捻起一缕乌黑的头发。{/n}“这些词来自我的故乡艾弗里特，与{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的语言有很大区别。在我们的语言中，每个词都包含着很多种不同的含义。这样一来，我们的智者便可以充分阐释他们的深邃思想，而我们这些普通人则可以表达我们基本的激情与欲望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊用手指捻起一缕乌黑的头发。{/n}“这些词来自我的故乡艾弗里特，与{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的语言有很大区别。在我们的语言中，每个词都包含着很多种不同的含义。这样一来，我们的智者便可以充分阐释他们的深邃思想，而我们这些普通人则可以表达我们基本的激情与欲望。”

languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the Koronus Expanse. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly commoners, our base passions and desires."

languages.text: {n}Jae enrolla un mechón de su cabello negro en su dedo.{/n} «El idioma de Efreet, mi planeta natal, es bastante distinto al que se habla en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Proporcionamos más de un significado a cada palabra, para que nuestros sabios puedan expresar la totalidad de sus sagaces pensamientos y nosotros, los meros estudiantes, nuestras pasiones y deseos vulgares».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae enrolla un mechón de su cabello negro en su dedo.{/n} «El idioma de Efreet, mi planeta natal, es bastante distinto al que se habla en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Proporcionamos más de un significado a cada palabra, para que nuestros sabios puedan expresar la totalidad de sus sagaces pensamientos y nosotros, los meros estudiantes, nuestras pasiones y deseos vulgares».

languages.text: {n}ジェイはカラスのような黒髪を指に巻きつける。{/n}「あたしの故郷であるイフリートの言葉は、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で話されているものとはまったく異なるの。あたしたちはそれぞれの言葉に複数の意味を持たせ、賢者は賢者の考えを、卑しい平民はその根っこにある情熱や欲望を表現することができるの」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはカラスのような黒髪を指に巻きつける。{/n}「あたしの故郷であるイフリートの言葉は、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で話されているものとはまったく異なるの。あたしたちはそれぞれの言葉に複数の意味を持たせ、賢者は賢者の考えを、卑しい平民はその根っこにある情熱や欲望を表現することができるの」

languages.text: {n}Jae beginnt, eine Strähne ihrer rabenschwarzen Haare um ihren Finger zu wickeln.{/n} "Die Sprache auf meiner Heimatwelt Efreet ist ganz anders als jene, die in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gesprochen wird. Wir schreiben jedem Wort mehr als nur eine Bedeutung zu, wodurch unsere Weisen ihre scharfsinnigen Gedanken ausdrücken können und wir einfacher Pöbel unsere niederen Gelüste und Begierden."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae beginnt, eine Strähne ihrer rabenschwarzen Haare um ihren Finger zu wickeln.{/n} "Die Sprache auf meiner Heimatwelt Efreet ist ganz anders als jene, die in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gesprochen wird. Wir schreiben jedem Wort mehr als nur eine Bedeutung zu, wodurch unsere Weisen ihre scharfsinnigen Gedanken ausdrücken können und wir einfacher Pöbel unsere niederen Gelüste und Begierden."

languages.text: {n}Jae commence à enrouler une mèche de ses cheveux noir de jais autour de son doigt.{/n} « La langue d'Éfrit, mon monde natal, est bien différente de celle que l'on parle dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Nous donnons à chaque mot plusieurs sens, ce qui permet aussi bien à nos sages de formuler pleinement leurs pensées avisées qu'à nous, humbles béotiens, d'exprimer nos passions et désirs primitifs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae commence à enrouler une mèche de ses cheveux noir de jais autour de son doigt.{/n} « La langue d'Éfrit, mon monde natal, est bien différente de celle que l'on parle dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Nous donnons à chaque mot plusieurs sens, ce qui permet aussi bien à nos sages de formuler pleinement leurs pensées avisées qu'à nous, humbles béotiens, d'exprimer nos passions et désirs primitifs. »

languages.text: {n}Jae, kuzgun siyahı saçlarının bir buklesini parmaklarının arasına alıp çeviriyor.{/n} "Yurdum İfrit'in dili, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} konuşulandan bayağı farklıdır. Her kelimeye birden fazla anlam yükleriz. Bu da arif olanların en bilgece düşüncelerini tam anlamıyla ifade edebilmesini, biz avamın da en temel tutkularımızı ve arzularımızı dile getirebilmemizi sağlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae starts to twist a strand of her raven black hair around her finger.{/n} "The language on Efreet, my homeworld, is quite different from the one spoken in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. We bestow more than one meaning upon each word, allowing our wise men to fully express their sagacious thoughts, and us, lowly dabblers, our base passions and desires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, kuzgun siyahı saçlarının bir buklesini parmaklarının arasına alıp çeviriyor.{/n} "Yurdum İfrit'in dili, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} konuşulandan bayağı farklıdır. Her kelimeye birden fazla anlam yükleriz. Bu da arif olanların en bilgece düşüncelerini tam anlamıyla ifade edebilmesini, biz avamın da en temel tutkularımızı ve arzularımızı dile getirebilmemizi sağlar."
